item.title: Report X-2023080863
item.description:
Report X-2023080863

Identified by scraper @ 2023-09-11T03:12:58+00:00

  • Incident Date: 2023-08-10
  • City: CARENCRO
  • State: LA
  • Report Type: A hazardous material incident
  • Mode Of Transportation: Highway
  • Carrier/Reporter: Fedex Ground Package System, Inc.
  • Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Hazmat Injuries: 0
  • Non-Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Description: SequenceEvent: Package was unloaded from trailer. Package handler noticed outer package was wet. Package was brought to QA area for processing. Package was place in blue hazmat bag. Upon opening box discovered one gallon of Acetone had loose cap. About 1 pint of Acetone liquid leaked out into inner bag and minimal amount leaked out onto outer packing box. DescribePack: Failure was located on top of gallon bottle. Cap was loose and caused failure. DurationRel: 2 and MitigateEffect: Package leakage was discovered in unload and package was instantly moved to QA area for inspection. Package was placed in blue hazmat bag for inspection. Package was inspected, then placed in yellow hazmat drum.

item.title: Report I-2023080037
item.description:
Report I-2023080037

Identified by scraper @ 2023-09-14T03:11:45+00:00

  • Incident Date: 2023-07-18
  • City: Abbeville
  • State: LA
  • Report Type: A hazardous material incident
  • Mode Of Transportation: Highway
  • Carrier/Reporter: SOUTHEASTERN FREIGHT LINES, INC.
  • Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Hazmat Injuries: 0
  • Non-Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Description: At 14:30 on 07/18/2023 driver proceeded to drive a half mile to next stop. The dock was on a decline he got in the trailer and the poly drums had turned over and 1 was Ieaking. He manuevered the drun to quit Ieaking and called safety. At 14:35 Hazmat one was called and clean up crew was dispatched. The spill was cleaned and disposed of by 18:33

item.title: Report X-2023080922
item.description:
Report X-2023080922

Identified by scraper @ 2023-09-11T03:12:58+00:00

  • Incident Date: 2023-07-24
  • City: BATON ROUGE
  • State: LA
  • Report Type: A hazardous material incident
  • Mode Of Transportation: Highway
  • Carrier/Reporter: Fedex Ground Package System, Inc.
  • Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Hazmat Injuries: 0
  • Non-Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Description: SequenceEvent: The package was found damaged inside the trailer. The package handler took it out the trailer along with, the bottles that came off the trailer. QA was notified by another team member that a hazmat was damaged. The QA person grabbed a red tote and brought the package to the hazmat area to be processed properly. DescribePack: The bottles inside the package was loose with one bottle noticeable leaked. The sulfuric acid turn the box black when leaked on the box. The acid also got on the other bottles. There was no inner packing to stop the package from getting damaged. DurationRel: 3 and MitigateEffect: The package was taken to the hazmat area to be processed processed properly.
